dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 207 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 215 1st Avenue in Amory, Mississippi, as the “Command Sergeant Major Lawrence E. Rabbit Kennedy Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 215 1st Avenue in Amory, Mississippi, as the Command Sergeant Major Lawrence E. Rabbit Kennedy Post Office Building.

section.header: Command Sergeant Major Lawrence E. Rabbit Kennedy Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 215 1st Avenue in Amory, Mississippi, shall be known and designated as the Command Sergeant Major Lawrence E. Rabbit Kennedy Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Command Sergeant Major Lawrence E. Rabbit Kennedy Post Office Building .

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 12, 2022.
